Home.about: Hello, I'm Mahmoud from Tunisia, a web developer specializing in React, Next, Node, TypeScript, and JavaScript. I love building websites with good UI/UX design, and I'm also passionate about new technologies.

Work.I_Love_Working_On: Technologies I rely on to bring web ideas to life
Work.React_js_Paragraph: My main framework is React.js and i can also use Redux Toolkit for state management.
Work.Node_Paragraph: Skilled in backend development using the Express.js framework to create robust APIs.
Work.Next_js_paragraph: I use Next.js as a full-stack framework with TypeScript, paired with MongoDB or PostgreSQL
Work.Tailwind_Paragraph: I think it's the best tool for CSS to create responsive and accessible Design.

Projects.title: Explore my recent full-stack applications
Projects.chat_app_intro: A full-stack real-time chat app with authentication, messages, read receipts, and email verification.
Projects.bookly_intro: A MERN-based library system where admins manage books and users can rate and comment.
Projects.property_pulse_intro: A modern real estate platform using Next.js 14 with search and property management features.
